craftable.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
craftable.desc: <tftitemrules>This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.</tftitemrules>

craftable.name: Infinity Edge
craftable.desc: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craftable.name: Protector's Vow
craftable.desc: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds and %i:scaleArmor% 35 Armor and %i:scaleMR% 35 Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

craftable.name: Shroud of Stillness
craftable.desc:
Combat start: Shoot a beam that 35% Mana Reaves enemies.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.desc:
Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

[Aura item]

craftable.name: Zephyr
craftable.desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: Zeke's Herald
craftable.desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleAS% 20% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Aura item]

craftable.name: Thief's Gloves
craftable.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craftable.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
craftable.desc: Attacks grant %i:scaleAS% 5% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

craftable.name: Ionic Spark
craftable.desc:
50% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are also zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: Dragon's Claw
craftable.desc: Every 2 seconds, regenerate 4% maximum Health.

craftable.name: Guardbreaker
craftable.desc: After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage for 3 seconds.

craftable.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
craftable.desc: Grants %i:scaleArmor% 15 Armor and %i:scaleMR% 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craftable.name: Bramble Vest
craftable.desc:
Negates 75.0% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal 75/100/150 %i:star% magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

[Direct damage item]

craftable.name: Giant Slayer
craftable.desc: Abilities and attacks deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

craftable.name: Sunfire Cape
craftable.desc:
Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is 10% Burned and 33% Wounded for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: deals some of the target's maximum Health as true damage
Wound: reduces healing received

craftable.name: Hand Of Justice
craftable.desc:
Grant 2 effects:
  • %i:scaleAD% +15.0% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% +15 Ability Power.
  • 15% Omnivamp.

    Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

    Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craftable.name: Edge of Night
craftable.desc:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain %i:scaleAS% 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: Blue Buff
craftable.desc:
Abilities cost %i:scaleMana% 10 less Mana to cast.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain %i:scaleMana% 10 Mana.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: Titan's Resolve
craftable.desc:
Grants %i:scaleAD% 2.0% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% 2.0 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, grant %i:scaleArmor% 25 Armor and %i:scaleMR% 25 Magic Resist.

craftable.name: Runaan's Hurricane
craftable.desc:
Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 50% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage.

​​[Direct damage item]

craftable.name: Bloodthirster
craftable.desc:
Grant 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craftable.name: Archangel's Staff
craftable.desc: Combat start: Grant %i:scaleAP% 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

craftable.name: Zz'Rot Portal

On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. The Voidspawn has massively reduced effectiveness when created by a summoned unit.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter
